about_page.description: An intelligent team management system, synchronized with Discord Bot.
about_page.feat_des_1: Create projects, assign tasks easily, and track team progress.
about_page.feat_des_2: The bot will remind you of upcoming deadlines to ensure progress.
about_page.feat_des_3: Configure the system to fit your team's specific needs.

login.no_code: No authentication code received from Discord!
login.invalid_user_data: User data from Discord is invalid!
login.server_error: An error occurred on the server!
